pages.text: function adjustIframeSize() { var iframe = document.getElementById('responsiveIframe'); var width = window.innerWidth * 0.8; // 80% of the screen width var height = window.innerHeight * 0.8; // 80% of the screen height iframe.width = width; iframe.height = height; } // Adjust size on page load window.onload = adjustIframeSize; // Adjust size on window resize window.onresize = adjustIframeSize; 开发者详情 ColdestBow30654(网名) 提供大部分技术支持 email:duan@hengduan.asia github开发者账号 xlhxzkill(网名) 提供部分技术支持 github开发者账号
